div.div: Here you will find instructions about using the sum up feature of calculator application.
Here you will learn what is subtraction.
Here you will find instructions about using the subtraction feature of calculator application.

div.p: Here you will find instructions about using the sum up feature of calculator application.
div.section: To successfully add numbers, you must know what is addition.
The result from summing up is displayed.

You want to add 2 with 3. The equation will look like 3+2=5. You enter 3. Press plus button. Enter 2. Press equals button.
The result 5 appears on the screen.

div.domains: (map mapgroup-d) (topic abbrev-d) (topic delay-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (map ditavalref-d) (map glossref-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)

div.p: Here you will learn what is subtraction.

To successfully perform the task of subtracting numbers, you must understand what is subtraction. the term "subtraction" represents a mathematical operation. Subtraction is a process and action that you perfrom using numbers. Subtraction allows you to find the difference of 2 numbers.
You use the minus(-) button to express the subtraction operation in the app.
In the subtraction process, you take a number and reduce it to a small number. That is, we take away one number from another.
Here you will find instructions about using the subtraction feature of calculator application.
div.section: To successfully subtract numbers, you must know what is subtraction.
The result from subtraction is displayed.

You want to subtract 2 from 3. The equation will look like 3-2=1. You enter 3. Press minus button. Enter 2. Press equals button.
The result 1 appears on the screen.

div.p: Here you will find instructions about using the multiplication feature of calculator application.
div.section: To successfully multiply numbers, you must know what is multiplication.
The result from multiplication is displayed.

You want to multiply 2 with 3. The equation will look like 3*2=6. You enter 3. Press star button. Enter 2. Press equals button.
The result 6 appears on the screen.

div.domains: (map mapgroup-d) (topic abbrev-d) (topic delay-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (map ditavalref-d) (map glossref-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)

div.p: Here you will find instructions about using the division feature of calculator application.
div.section: To successfully divide numbers, you must know what is division.
The result from division is displayed.

You want to divide 6 by 3. The equation will look like 6/3=2. You enter 6. Press forward slash button. Enter 3. Press equals button.
The result 2 appears on the screen.
